Package oop.AdministratorLogic

Class Administrator

java.lang.Object
oop.UserLogic.Role
oop.HospitalStaff
oop.AdministratorLogic.Administrator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentManagementInterface, InventoryManagementInterface, StaffManagementInterface
public class Administrator extends HospitalStaff implements StaffManagementInterface, AppointmentManagementInterface, InventoryManagementInterface
Represents an Administrator in the hospital system, managing hospital staff, appointments, and inventory. This class implements interfaces for staff management, appointment management, and inventory management.
Since:
2024-11-09
